text.en: If you control a Link-1 monster or a Level 2 Synchro Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Cupsie☆Yummy" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Yummy" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Cupsie☆Yummy", or, if this card was Special Summoned by a Synchro Monster's effect, you can draw 1 card instead. You can only use this effect of "Cupsie☆Yummy" once per turn.
